short_summary: Vector Signal Generator and Analyzer Systems
description: DEFENSE RESEARCH AND DEVELOPMENT CANADA (DRDC) OTTAWA RESEARCH CENTRE HAS A REQUIREMENT FOR A VECTOR SIGNAL GENERATOR (VSG) AND A VECTOR SIGNAL ANALYZER (VSA) TO PROVIDE SUPPORT TO RESEARCH AND DEVELOPMENT (R&D) ACTIVITIES IN A LABORATORY ENVIRONMENT. DOCUMENTS MAY BE SUBMITTED IN EITHER OFFICIAL LANGUAGE OF CANADA.
duration_in_months: ;Number of tender Currency is not specifiedAll other currencies are not used for estimation.
full_summary:
### Tender Notification

#### Title

* **Vector Signal Generator and Analyzer Systems**

* **Expected Contract End Date**: 2024-10-18

#### Contract Requirements

#### Technical Details

* **Customer**: Defence Research and Development Canada (DRDC) Ottawa Research Centre

#### Bidders Inquiries
